rooms.name: Secret Entrance
rooms.effect: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle

rooms.name: Forge
rooms.effect: Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature.

rooms.name: Catacombs
rooms.effect: Create a 4/1 black Skeleton creature token with menace.

rooms.name: Throne of the Dead Three
rooms.effect: Reveal the top ten cards of your library. Put a creature card from among them onto the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it. It gains hexproof until your next turn. Then shuffle.
